task.name: hif_mstransform
task.shortdescription: Create new MeasurementSets for science target imaging
task.description:
Create new MeasurementSets for imaging from the corrected column of the input MeasurementSet. By default all science target data is copied to the new MS. The new MeasurementSet is not re-indexed to the selected data and the new MS will have the same source, field, and spw names and ids as it does in the parent MS.
Output
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.name: vis
param.description:
The list of input MeasurementSets. Defaults to the list of MeasurementSets specified in the h_init or hif_importdata task. '': use all MeasurementSets in the context
Examples: 'ngc5921.ms', ['ngc5921a.ms', ngc5921b.ms', 'ngc5921c.ms']

param.name: outputvis
param.shortdescription: The list of transformed MeasurementSets to be used for imaging
param.description:
The list of output transformed MeasurementSets to be used for imaging. The output list must be the same length as the input list. The default output name defaults to <msrootname>_cont.ms
Examples: 'ngc5921.ms', ['ngc5921a.ms', ngc5921b.ms', 'ngc5921c.ms']

param.name: field
param.shortdescription: Set of data selection field names or ids, \'\' for all
param.description:
Select fields name(s) or id(s) to transform. Only fields with data matching the intent will be selected.
Examples: '3C279', 'Centaurus*', '3C279,J1427-421'

param.name: intent
param.description:
Select intents for which associated fields will be imaged. By default only TARGET data is selected.
Examples: 'PHASE,BANDPASS'

param.name: spw
param.shortdescription: Set of data selection spectral window ids \'\' for all
param.description: Select spectral window/channels to image. By default all science spws for which the specified intent is valid are selected .

param.name: chanbin
param.shortdescription: Width (bin) of input channels to average to form an output channel.
param.description: Width (bin) of input channels to average to form an output channel. If chanbin > 1 then chanaverage is automatically switched to True.

param.name: timebin
param.description: Bin width for time averaging. If timebin > 0s then timeaverage is automatically switched to True.

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or just display the command (True)
param.description: Run the task (False) or just display the command (True)

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Add the results to the pipeline context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False).

task.example:
1. Create a science target MS from the corrected column in the input MS.
hif_mstransform()
2. Make a phase and bandpass calibrator targets MS from the corrected column in the input MS.
hif_mstransform(intent='PHASE,BANDPASS')
